post.summary: Assign VideoEdge devices to an upgrade package

parameters.name: effectiveDate

deliverySystems.description: A list of delivery systems serving the audience

networkLocations.description: An optional list of network locations

estimatedTimeForMulticastStreamsToBeAvai.description: A configurable property, provides an estimated time (in seconds) for multicast streams to be available after provisioning. This can be used as a live indicator and/or as a trigger for starting recording

multicastEnabled.description: Returnes a true value if at least one delivery system in the audience supports multicast

estimatedTimeForMulticastStreamsTobeAvai.description: A configurable property, provides an estimated time (in seconds) for multicast streams to be available after provisioning. This can be used as a live indicator and/or as a trigger for starting recording
